article.title: Amplifier Research to Provide High Power Radio Frequency Amplifier Systems for U.S. Navy
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Amplifier Research Corporation is being awarded a $5.7 million, firm-fixed-price, indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract for high power radio frequency amplifier systems in support of expeditionary electronic warfare systems. The amplifiers are portable, self-contained, broadband, solid-state amplifiers designed for instantaneous bandwidth and high gain and linearity. The Naval Surface Warfare Center, Crane Division, Crane, Indiana, is the contracting activity.
